page.title: 09Traditional games (2)
page.content: {Hop_Scotch}is a popular game .You have to draw out a grid and number it 1 t0 10 like this { 2 5 8 }You have to { 1 4 7 10 } { 3 6 9 throw a stone onto the grid and then hop onto the square on which it landed.You then pick up the stone without putting your foot down. {Semi_circle Touch.}At our old school in the playground there were two semi_circular areas.You would have to run to each area without anyone touching you.If you got caught you were out. {Granny's Footsteps.}One person stands with her back to the others who are ready to play.When Granny's back is turned the players have to creep up behind.If Granny turns round they must freeze.If they move they are out.
